segments.text: I'm here to pay my telephone bill . I usually go to the post office , but I was told that I could take care of it here . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's correct , Madam . You don't need to go to a counter at all , you can use one of our ATM machines . I'll be more than happy to help you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't usually like to use Atms , I like dealing with a real person , you see .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know it does seem a little daunting , but once you get used to it , it will save you a lot of time and trouble .
segments.speaker: S1
